channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software -- Telerik Report Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software -- Telerik Report Server

item.title: CVE-2024-4837|2024-06-06T19:53:12.640Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress Telerik Report Server, version 2024 Q1 (10.0.24.305) or earlier, on IIS, an unauthenticated attacker can gain access to Telerik Report Server restricted functionality via a trust boundary violation vulnerability.
